Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, maintaining entity integrity for the table.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Verifies that all rows have a non-null customer_id, as required by the PRIMARY KEY constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the full_name column, which may impact customer identification and downstream processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the date_of_birth column, which may affect age calculations and compliance checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the gender column, which may impact demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the address column, which may affect customer contactability and regulatory requirements.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the phone_number column, which may impact customer communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the email_address column, which may impact digital communication and marketing.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the national_id_or_passport_number column, which may affect identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the occupation column, which may impact customer profiling.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the customer_type column, which may affect segmentation and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the account_numbers column, which may impact account linkage and financial analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the age column, which may affect eligibility and demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_by column, which may impact audit trails and data lineage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_on column, which may affect auditability and record tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_by column, which may impact audit trails for updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_on column, which may affect tracking of record modifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the status column, which may impact workflow and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Ensures that age values are valid integers and non-negative, preventing illogical age entries.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND (age < 0 OR age::text !~ '^[0-9]+$')

Description: Checks for invalid date_of_birth entries, ensuring proper date values are stored.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth::text !~ '^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$'

Description: Detects email_address values that do not conform to standard email patterns, reducing risk of communication failures.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks for phone_number values that do not match expected patterns (e.g., digits, optional +).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~ '^\+?[0-9\- ]{7,20}$'

Description: Identifies gender values outside the expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), which may cause reporting errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), ensuring workflow consistency.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Detects duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate identity issues or data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Detects duplicate email_address values, which may lead to communication errors or duplicate records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for logical consistency between age and date_of_birth, flagging records where the calculated age does not match the stored age.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, age, date_of_birth FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> DATE_PART('year', AGE(date_of_birth))

Description: Ensures that created_on is not after modified_on, maintaining temporal consistency for record changes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, created_on, modified_on FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on
